long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notesilo is a tool that helps you take notes, make timestamps and even invite friends while watching videos on YouTube.

Notesilo is easy to install from the Google Chrome store, a widget appears on the right side of your screen when watching a video on YouTube once the extension is properly installed.

To make timestamps all you have to do is click on pin while the video is at the moment you'll like to view later.

You can also make notes in reference to the time stamp you've made by typing a note on the timestamp.

Notesilo lets you invite other users or recieve invites to see your timestamps or notes.

You can easily do that by clicking the invite user button on the top left of the extension screen when making timestamps and notes. All you need is for them is to be a Notesilo user and their Email.

Disclaimer: Notesilo is not affiliated to YouTube in any way or form.

Get started today! Install Notesilo from the Google Chrome store.
